content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Khloe Kardashian admitted during a July 3 court hearing that she violated her probation, which stemmed from a 2007 drunken driving arrest, and was sentenced to three days in Los Angeles County jail.

“She admitted to failing to complete [roadside cleanup duty] and enroll in an alcohol education class,” said L.A. City Attorney spokesman Frank Mateljan.

Khloe Kardashian was simply too busy being sort of famous to abide by the rules of her probation.

The younger sister of Kim Kardashian has until July 18 to begin serving her sentence. She can always talk to her sibling’s former best friend, Paris Hilton, about what it’s like to spend time behibd bars.

“Khloe is ready and willing to serve out her sentence, no matter how long and where, and have this resolved,” her publicist, Jeff Raymond, told The Associated Press.
